item.description:
Again, thanks for your help.  Some of the books suggested had been read by the group in the past.  Suggestions you might consider for the future include The Map and The Territory by Houellebecq and books by Louise Erdrich and Marquez.

Wind, Sand and Stars by Saint-Exupery. An early pioneering aviator, evokes a series of events in his life...by recounting several episodes from his years flying treacherous mail routes across the African Sahara and South American Andes. ...Themes deal with friendship, death, heroism, camaraderie and solidarity among colleagues, humanity and the search for meaning in life.

group.name: The Brookline Book Club Meetup Group

item.name: We will read Wind, Sand and Stars by Saint-Exupery for February.
